bike.description: Specialized SL4 FACT 10r carbon, FACT construction, tapered/shaped 1-1/8" to size-specific lower headtube, compact race design, Zertz, internal cable routing, OSBB

components.description: Specialized Roubaix FACT carbon full monocoque, Zertz, size-specific
1-1/8" upper and size specific lower, Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, 8mm carbon cone spacer, w/ 20mm of carbon spacers
S-Works CG-R, FACT carbon w/ Zertz, 27.2mm
